author: Reppy 07
comment: Very well done. Battery life extended to two days on my Huawei. Needs to have an option to disable ambient mode. During the day, it's next to impossible to see. Could you add a new option for this date format? "Tue/Feb 10/2017". Would also be nice to have the seconds counter as well.

author: IHate GooglePlus
comment: Overall I like it. I wanted a minimal digital watch face. The only thing I don't care for is the date format you can't change. I'm not European/Asian, so I would prefer the North American format (MM/DD/YY).

author: Divinely Deedee
comment: "Perfect & Works Great w/ Samsung Live gear!" It is just what I have been looking for. The app displays the time, battery, and the date, with allowing me to choose the color  (mine is hot pink, right now, Lol!!). Thanks, I am very pleased with this app! 😊

author: Tim Smith
comment: May be one of my favorite minimalist watch faces. Hardly used any battery. There is options to change color and date format. The battery bar is a nice touch. Would definitely recommend if you are looking for a simple watchface.

author: Chris
comment: Brilliant. Love the minimal look and the battery curve is genius. Lots of configurable options from the Huawei watch app, including date formatt for you weird Americans. Would have preferred a solid white font for the dim view though, instead of wire frame.

author: Quiet -
comment: I use this app on my moto 360 1st gen. I just purchase new   Smartwatch huawei 2gen and I like to app so much I switched it over it's the only one that I use and whatever color I have on I change color. Great app plan and simple that's all I was looking for.

author: R Kirk
comment: Excellent, simple minimalist watch face. On an AMOLED display, it activates a minimal level of pixels to preserve battery life. The "smile line" across the screen indicates battery life remaining, and can be suppressed if you deem it a distraction. Date format and if the day of the week is adjustable. Settings can be accessed in the Android Wear app on your phone, not with a separate icon.

author: mark breeze
comment: Great simple interface for minimal screen guff date,time,battery sometimes that's all you need on a watch.colour selection fantastic with choice of formats to date and time,not sure if it's a battery drainer yet,but overall amongst some of the good ones out there

author: Tom Bridges
comment: Although it says there is an option to set the time format this is not shown on my watch. Also no performance improvement seen

author: Brandon Reed
comment: It's a virus. Drained my battery, constantly crashes my watch, and now i can't uninstall. I hate you

author: Michael De Santa [aka TheGamerKing]
comment: I really love the slick UI design and the colors. It works great on my ZenWatch and has good colors.. I had to restart my ZenWatch to be able to get this app. But otherwise, good job. 😉👍

author: Jim Gallagher
comment: I like the watch face, just doesn't look very good on square face.

author: Justin Fahringer
comment: Simple and clean, first watch face I downloaded to try and take advantage of my watches amoled screen. Hopefully it also saves battery life.

author: Andrew M
comment: Just downloaded it and I like it so far. It'd be perfect if you could add a weather sticky so I can always view it.

author: Ryan Rush
comment: Love the simplicity of this face. Just wish their were a few more date format options and a second option. Still great though

author: Howard Fath
comment: I liked it on my Moto 360, but apparently it will not work on my new Samsung Gear S2.  Wish it would.

author: Micki K
comment: It is a very minimalist watchface that is well thought out!  All the main information is pleasantly laid out and easily customized.

author: Larry Klipstein
comment: I like the colors but would like to see some preset faces to chose from. Also weather temperature be a good addition.

author: Tav P
comment: Really Nice, I like being able to change the colors to match what Im wearing. I enjoy the simplicity of it too.

author: Garry Ashwood
comment: Looks really neat and I think it's helped with battery life

author: Jim Jueneman
comment: Which it worked for my huawei watch and Droid phone..????it install but does not function or create short cut

author: Vipul Aggarwal
comment: How to use it? It doesn't shows any app on my phone or gear s3

author: Mike Lewis
comment: Very stylish, but the inactive screen is very dark even at a high brightness setting.

author: Jerry Williams
comment: Loved the watch faces battery drained after 12 hrs normal use. Had to uninstall

author: Jay Poscente
comment: The best looking digital watch face ever. Simple, elegant and bug free
great app, just what I wanted,  simple and easy to read , just needs to pass the battery life test

author: N Federico
comment: Ambient mode needs to be brighter or at least have user adjustable options to do so.

author: Shawn D'Costa
comment: Would like to see digital battery percentage as option. Would give 5 star rating.

author: Julie Stafford
comment: Nice simple face, low battery drain.

author: Rael Imperial Aerosol Kid
comment: Nice display: I like the fact that you can choose any color display that you like!

author: Kristoforus H. Cahyawan
comment: Love the endless possibilities of colours, could be better with phone battery indicator.
Very simple face, but seems to extend battery life significantly!

author: Chris Phelps
comment: Very clean and simple design!

author: Youssef Chammas
comment: This watch face looks nice very stylish customizable and it works fine

author: mohd hayati
comment: I like this watch face.

author: David Wolnik
comment: Simple, easy to read. My go to face for my LG Urbane.

author: Travis Lauver
comment: Clean simple watch face that doesn't drain your battery.

author: Brian Jameson
comment: Just a very pleasing design. I use it a lot for everyday

author: Gongo J
comment: Pretty cool and love that I can customize it and change colors.

author: Richard M McMurray
comment: My favorite Moto 360 watch face so far.
